title: 2021 Holiday Gift Guide: All the Gift Ideas You’ll Need
sub_head: We’ve got all kinds of gift guides for you—for all kinds of loved ones, from fashion fans to foodies, travel nuts to design enthusiasts, and even the nerdy gearheads on your list. And nearly everything is under $300.
body:
LAST YEAR, facing a somber holiday season, we told our gift guide readers to resist “lizard-covered cocktail spoons” and other “silly” fare. This year…well, we’re still not quite ready to bring on the reptilian flatware, but concepts like whimsy, fun and a little impracticality seem apropos again. Our discerning editors have rounded up 47 gift ideas under $300—from modern cuckoo clocks and bulldog-shaped ice cubes to a deconstructed BlackBerry amusingly memorialized in a frame—that strike the right note for a decidedly more festive, optimistic Noel.
There’s something for every kind of giftee here, from bakers to backpackers to beauty buffs. We’ve split the presents into five categories: fashion, design, food, gear and travel. (And if the holiday spirit is truly loosening your purse strings, we’ve thrown in five splurge-worthy, big-ticket items, too.)
